con:part.con:content: {"swagger":"2.0","info":{"description":"Part Repository Service REST API","version":"1.0.0.2","title":"PartRepository Service REST API","termsOfService":"Conduent Internal","contact":{"name":"CAP Support","url":"https://www.Conduent.com","email":"CAP-Support@conduent.com"},"license":{"name":"Conduent Internal only"}},"schemes":["https","http"],"consumes":["application/json"],"paths":{"/part":{"post":{"tags":["PartRepositoryService"],"summary":"Creates part in the repository","description":"Returns 200 status code on successful creation.","operationId":"PartRepositoryService_Post","consumes":["application/json"],"produces":["application/json"],"parameters":[{"in":"body","name":"partInfo","required":true,"schema":{"$ref":"#/definitions/PartDto"}}],"responses":{"201":{"description":"successful operation"},"400":{"description":"Bad Request","schema":{"$ref":"#/definitions/ProblemDetails"}},"404":{"description":"Error occured while saving Part information","schema":{"$ref":"#/definitions/ProblemDetails"},"x-nullable":true},"409":{"description":"Error occurred while unique value already existing within Repository","schema":{"$ref":"#/definitions/ProblemDetails"},"x-nullable":true},"default":{"description":"Unknown Error Occurred","schema":{"$ref":"#/definitions/ProblemDetails"},"x-nullable":true}}},"put":{"tags":["PartRepositoryService"],"summary":"Updates Part in the Repository.","description":"Returns 200 status code on successful update.","operationId":"PartRepositoryService_Put","consumes":["application/json"],"produces":["application/json"],"parameters":[{"in":"body","name":"partInfo","required":true,"schema":{"$ref":"#/definitions/PartDto"}}],"responses":{"200":{"description":"successful operation","schema":{"type":"string","example":"partname"}},"400":{"description":"Bad Request","schema":{"$ref":"#/definitions/ProblemDetails"}},"404":{"description":"Error occured while updating Part information","schema":{"$ref":"#/definitions/ProblemDetails"},"x-nullable":true},"409":{"description":"Error occurred while unique value was changed to a value already existing","schema":{"$ref":"#/definitions/ProblemDetails"},"x-nullable":true},"default":{"description":"Unknown Error Occurred","schema":{"$ref":"#/definitions/ProblemDetails"},"x-nullable":true}}}},"/part/{name}":{"get":{"tags":["PartRepositoryService"],"summary":"Gets a part model by name","description":"Returns a part model","operationId":"PartRepositoryService_GetByName","produces":["application/json"],"parameters":[{"name":"name","in":"path","description":"Part Name. ","required":true,"type":"string","x-nullable":true}],"responses":{"200":{"description":"Part Information","schema":{"$ref":"#/definitions/PartDto"},"x-nullable":true},"404":{"description":"Error occured while fetching part information by name","schema":{"$ref":"#/definitions/ProblemDetails"},"x-nullable":true},"default":{"description":"Unknown Error Occurred","schema":{"$ref":"#/definitions/ProblemDetails"},"x-nullable":true}}},"delete":{"tags":["PartRepositoryService"],"summary":"Deletes Part by name from Repository.","description":"Returns 200 status code on successful deletion.","operationId":"PartRepositoryService_Delete","produces":["application/json"],"parameters":[{"name":"name","in":"path","description":"Part Name ","required":true,"type":"string","x-nullable":true}],"responses":{"200":{"description":"successful operation"},"404":{"description":"Error occured while deleting Part information","schema":{"$ref":"#/definitions/ProblemDetails"},"x-nullable":true},"default":{"description":"Unknown Error Occurred","schema":{"$ref":"#/definitions/ProblemDetails"},"x-nullable":true}}}},"/part/type/{type}":{"get":{"tags":["PartRepositoryService"],"summary":"Get Part by partType and if given, Attribute from Repository","description":"Returns Part model","operationId":"PartRepositoryService_GetByType","produces":["application/json"],"parameters":[{"name":"type","in":"path","description":"Part type ","required":true,"type":"string","enum":["workflowTemplate","workflowStep","blueprintTemplate","blueprintStep"],"x-nullable":true},{"name":"orderBy","in":"query","description":"Order By Sort for Returned Result ","required":true,"type":"string","default":"id","x-nullable":false},{"name":"attributeInfo","in":"body","required":false,"schema":{"$ref":"#/definitions/Attribute"},"x-nullable":true},{"type":"integer","name":"begin","in":"query","format":"int32","default":0,"x-nullable":false},{"type":"integer","name":"end","in":"query","format":"int32","default":0,"x-nullable":false}],"responses":{"200":{"description":"successful operation","schema":{"$ref":"#/definitions/PartDto"},"x-nullable":true},"404":{"description":"Error occured while fetching part information by name","schema":{"$ref":"#/definitions/ProblemDetails"},"x-nullable":true},"default":{"description":"Unknown Error Occurred","schema":{"$ref":"#/definitions/ProblemDetails"},"x-nullable":true}}}}},"definitions":{"PartDto":{"type":"object","description":"Represent a part to be use in the designer","required":["name","description","searchTags","designerRepresentation","partType"],"properties":{"name":{"type":"string","description":"part name","uniqueItems":true,"example":"partname"},"description":{"type":"string","description":"part description","example":"partdescription"},"searchTags":{"type":"array","description":"search tags for the part","example":["CreateDate","ModifyDate"],"items":{"type":"string"},"minItems":1},"designerRepresentation":{"type":"string","description":"designer representation of the part","example":"jsonorxmldesignerrepresentation"},"partType":{"type":"string","description":"Part Type, is used as the Id of the mode","enum":["workflowTemplate","workflowStep","blueprintTemplate","blueprintStep"],"example":"workflowTemplate"},"attributes":{"type":"array","description":"custom attributes for the part that can be use for the UI interaction","uniqueItems":true,"example":{"name":"atrName","value":"atrValue"},"items":{"$ref":"#/definitions/Attribute"}}},"title":"PartDto"},"Attribute":{"type":"object","description":"Represents an attribute","required":["name","value"],"properties":{"name":{"type":"string","description":"Attribute Name","example":"name"},"value":{"type":"string","description":"Attribute Value","example":"value"}},"title":"Attribute"},"ProblemDetails":{"type":"object","properties":{"type":{"type":"string","example":"Exception"},"title":{"type":"string","example":"Error"},"status":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","example":400},"detail":{"type":"string","example":"exception has occurred"},"instance":{"type":"string","example":"instance"}},"additionalProperties":{}}},"host":"virtserver.swaggerhub.com","basePath":"/Conduent-DP/PartRepository_Service/1.0.0.1"}

con:representation.con:description: Error occured while fetching part information by name
Error occured while deleting Part information
Error occured while fetching part information by name

con:method.name: PartRepositoryService_Post
con:method.con:description: Returns 200 status code on successful creation. Creates part in the repository

con:representation.con:description: Error occured while saving Part information
Error occurred while unique value already existing within Repository

con:method.name: PartRepositoryService_Put
con:method.con:description: Returns 200 status code on successful update. Updates Part in the Repository.

con:representation.con:description: Error occured while updating Part information
Error occurred while unique value was changed to a value already existing

con:request.con:description: Returns 200 status code on successful update.
